name: Stone Wardens - Action RPG meets Tower Defense! (Canceled)
blurb: Stone Wardens is a fun blend of Action RPG and Tower Defense, with solo and group play - available for PC, Mac, and Linux.

rewards.reward: Community Backer\r\n\u2022 Thank you for supporting Stone Wardens and helping us deliver a great game! As a Community Backer you\u2019ll have access to development updates through our Kickstarter page and can participate in the development process through polls, forums, and our developer diary blog.
Early Bird Game Backer\r\n\u2022\tYou get all of the $20 Game Backer tier - limited to 250.

Game Backer with Speed Enchanted Gear!
•	Get a digital download of the full PC, Mac, or Linux version when Stone Wardens is released. 
•	You'll also get an exclusive, backer-only, enchanted item for all of your Wardens. This item is worn on the back, and provides an increase to the Warden's movement speed.
• Important note: This backer tier also includes everything from the tiers before it.
Early Bird Beta Backer\r\n\u2022\tYou get all of the $30 Beta Backer tier - limited to 250.

Beta Backer with Health Enchanted Gear! 
• Be among the first to play Stone Wardens! All Beta Backers will enjoy first access to the Beta version of the game. 
• You'll also get an exclusive, backer-only, enchanted item for all of your Wardens. This item is worn on the head, and provides an increase to the Warden's health. 
• Important note: This backer tier also includes everything from the tiers before it.
Early Bird Alpha Backer\r\n\u2022\tYou get all of the $40 Alpha Backer tier - limited to 100.

Alpha Backer with Damage Enchanted Gear and the Lapin Trinket! 
• Be among the first to play Stone Wardens! All Alpha Backers will enjoy exclusive access to the Alpha version of the game. 
• You'll also get exclusive, backer-only, enchanted items for all of your Wardens. These items are equipped in your hands and provide an increase to the Warden's damage.  
• All your Wardens also get the Lapin Trinket, which, when equipped on your Warden, lets them grow rabbit ears and a tail. 
• Important note: This backer tier also includes everything from the tiers before it.

Heroic Backer with Horned Emerald Dragonette, Heroic Backer Outfit, Lightstep Trinket, and Game Expansions for life!
•	All your Wardens receive an exclusive, backer-only, Horned Emerald Dragonette familiar with poison breath attack!
• All your Wardens also receive an exclusive outfit designed to look great with the Enchanted Gear from the earlier tiers. 
•	Get unlimited DLC and game expansions for life! This includes challenge packs with new invaders, environments, and game modes as well as added Stone Wardens and familiars.
•	All your Wardens also get the Lightstep Trinket, which, when equipped on your Warden, lights up each step your Warden takes.
•	Important note: This backer tier also includes everything from the tiers before it.

Heroic Plus with Friend Copy, Emerald Flora Familiar, and Butterfly Trinket!
• Receive an additional digital copy of the game you can give to a friend. 
•	All your Wardens also get the exclusive Emerald Flora familiar, which gathers nearby spirit dropped by the invaders.
• All your Wardens also receive the Butterfly Trinket, which, when equipped, attracts butterflies to fly nearby and accompany your Warden.
• Important note: This backer tier also includes everything from the tiers before it.

Legendary Backer with additional Friend Copy, Emerald Robit Familiar, and Death Marker Trinket!
• All your Wardens receive the exclusive Emerald Robit familiar, which drops bomblets when approached by invaders.
• All your Wardens also get the Death Marker Trinket, which, when equipped on your Warden, causes invaders killed by you to burst into stars.
• In addition, you get ANOTHER digital copy of the game for a second friend. 
•	Important note: This backer tier includes everything from the tiers before it. Accounts activated with friend keys will not include any exclusive backer items or access to the beta or alpha but your friends will be able to use the friend key to play with you when we release the game to the public.

Legendary Plus with additional Friend Copy, Emerald Falcon Familiar, Art, and Audio!
• You get ANOTHER digital copy of the game for a 3rd friend, giving you a total of three friend keys and your backer key.
• All your Wardens receive the exclusive Emerald Falcon familiar with falcon strike attack. 
• You get Stone Wardens digital art files, sized and formatted for use on Facebook, Twitter, and YouTube.
• In addition, you get the digital audio files for all of the original music tracks used in Stone Wardens and a digital collection of the concept art from the game.
• Important note: This backer tier includes everything from the tiers before it. Accounts activated with friend keys will not include any exclusive backer items or access to the beta or alpha but your friends will be able to use the friend key to play with you when we release the game to the public.

Adviser
• You will be listed in the game credits as an adviser. Credits are accessible from within the game.
• Advisers have access to exclusive adviser forums, updates, and surveys used to help inform design and content decisions.
• You may reserve a name for use with any one of your Wardens. Name conflicts with other Advisers will be resolved by random lot.
•  Advisers may reserve a game account username, which is used in the game forums.
• Important note: This backer tier includes everything from the tiers before it.

Play Adviser\r\n\u2022\tHave fun playing Stone Wardens with us! Play advisers will be invited to participate in at least one, one hour online play session with the developers and other advisers at this tier and above during alpha/beta. Play sessions will be used to help balance content, inform design, and make future content decisions.\r\n\u2022\tImportant note: Play sessions are online and not in-person. This backer tier also includes everything from the tiers before it.

Play Adviser Plus
•	Reserve a total of two names that can be used for your Wardens 
•	Have fun playing Stone Wardens with us! You will be invited to participate in at least four, one hour online play sessions with the developers and other advisers during alpha/beta. Play sessions will be used to help balance content, inform design, and make future content decisions.
•	Important note: Play sessions are online and not in-person. This backer tier also includes everything from the tiers before it.

NPC
•	Send us your photo and we’ll create an in-game NPC (non-player character) from your likeness, and send you a printed and signed copy of the concept art.
•	You will be invited to participate in at least one online live chat collaboration session with the developers and other backers.
•	Important note: This backer tier also includes everything from the tiers before it.

Challenger
•	Help design and name a challenge with the developers! Work with the team over Skype or in our offices, to design and test a challenge. You will decide the locations of the paths, the placement options for the Guardians, and the composition of the Invaders. Within the constraints of the game, and after play testing shows that it is playable and fun, you get to name the challenge.
•	You will be invited to participate in one private play session with the developers.
•	Important note: Travel and lodging not included. This backer tier also includes everything from the tiers before it.

Immortal
•	You will be invited to our office to meet with the developers. While there, photos will be taken so that our artists can create an ancestral guardian in your image. 
•	You will receive digital copies of the concepts created from your photos, signed by the artists.
•	Have lunch with the developers and discuss Stone Wardens, philosophy, art, or any other topic you choose.
•	During your visit, play Stone Wardens with the developers.
•	Important note: Travel and lodging not included. This backer tier includes everything from all tiers.
